translations: n.[林]吉纳紫檀；水溶性树脂；电影院

phrs.translation: 进挪, 奇诺, 肢体接触, 吉纳紫檀
街机游戏合集重制版, 街机游戏合集

sentences.sentence: Kino had found the Pearl of the World.
sentences.translation: 吉纳已经发现了世上最大的珍珠。

sentences.sentence: Kino has found the Pearl of the World.
sentences.translation: 吉纳发现了世界上最大的珍珠。

sentences.sentence: So the successful slapstick comedy Kino started up.
sentences.translation: 于是，成功的闹剧《影院》就此开始了。
